column1: >Implying the U.S. will ever invest anything into infrastructure
But if you want a more accurate depiction of the highways of the future; watch the Mad Max movies or Fury Road.
What I love  most is knowing how many people will be triggered by this video.
What an innocent time, I kinda wish we could somehow reclaim such a positive excitement for the future instead of cynicism.
well we have scooters for overweighted people in supermarkets
